Vint Cerf said Eric Schmidt , 55, had been chief executive for 10 years- "a nice round number"- and Page, now 37, was ready to lead the company into the future. Larry and Sergey Brin are 10 years older than they were when they thoughtfully hired Eric Schmidt to be the CEO... so everybody's growing up, Vint Cerf said.
